CasterCommand.label: Caster Command
CasterCommand.tooltip: The command you use to shout a caster out

Permission.label: Permission level
Permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

InTransition.label: In Transition
InTransition.tooltip: Set how the alert transitions in

OutTransition.label: Out Transition
OutTransition.tooltip: Set how the alert transitions out

Duration.label: Duration (seconds)
Duration.tooltip: How long the overlay is displayed.

InSound.label: In Sound
InSound.tooltip: sound effect to play on in transition

OutSound.label: Out Sound
OutSound.tooltip: sound effect to play on out transition
